description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 9244 3175 Quebec. The average
  contract duration was 1.12 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.2M. The longest
  contract was 1.55 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.6M.
